name: XCSourceEditorExtension
desc: The protocol you implement to create Xcode source editor extensions.

items.name: var commandDefinitions: [[XCSourceEditorCommandDefinitionKey : Any]]
items.desc: The array of command definitions used by Xcode to associate command names with their implementation in an extension.

items.name: func extensionDidFinishLaunching()
items.desc: Tells the extension that it successfully launched and may begin to receive editor commands.
